en.slide1-text: The perfect destination for your dream vacation.
en.slide2-heading: Experience calm and luxury at Bali Resort.
en.slide3-heading: We are delighted to welcome you to Bali Resort.
en.slide3-text: Where every moment is designed specifically for your comfort.

id.slide1-heading: Halo! Selamat datang di Bali Resort
id.slide1-text: Destinasi sempurna untuk liburan impian Anda.
id.slide2-heading: Rasakan ketenangan dan kemewahan di Bali Resort.
id.slide2-text: Liburan impian Anda dimulai di sini.
id.slide3-heading: Kami dengan senang hati menyambut Anda di Bali Resort.
id.slide3-text: Di mana setiap momen dirancang khusus untuk kenyamanan Anda.
